comments.body: The toObject at bottom looks promising: https://github.com/protobufjs/protobuf.js/pull/1258#issuecomment-953476331
We're going to wrap the output of `describe` in a JS friendly object instead of returning the raw grpc response.
We've recently done this in Java and Python.

title: [Feature Request] Wrap `WorkflowHandle.describe` output in a JS friendly object
